pullrequest.title: Disable loading nested models in DART and Simbody

content.raw:
I modified the `INTEGRATION_nested_world` test slightly in 9a533420718f (branch `disable_nested_scpeters`):

* add console error messages when aborting tests
* allow `nested_model.world` to load and take one physics step before aborting for dart and simbody to confirm that gazebo won't crash when loading and running that world
content.html:
I modified the INTEGRATION_nested_world test slightly in 9a533420718f (branch disable_nested_scpeters):

  • add console error messages when aborting tests
  • allow nested_model.world to load and take one physics step before aborting for dart and simbody to confirm that gazebo won't crash when loading and running that world
